summary.p:
A pharmaceutical dictionary by Édouard Ariel, in three sections:
Dictionary, French-Portuguese-Tamil-Hindi-Telugu (U1a).
Dictionary, French-Tamil (U1b).
Dictionary, French-Tamil-Portuguese (U1c).
Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (December 2021).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

extent.note: The leaves are broader in their middle than at their edges.

supportDesc.foliation: Library Arabic foliation1 1-21 + Library Arabic foliation2 1-104; 115-196, and, partly parallel, original pagination 1-186.

collation.desc: the front cover. Marbled recto verso. Shelfmark on the recto.
2 folios = front guard leaves. No foliation. Blank recto verso. f[1]r marbled. BnF shelfmark (f[2]r).
126 folios = Dictionary. 12 + 10 + 93 + {1} folios (U1a + U1b + U1c + U1d). 220 x 295 mm.
12 folios = Dictionary, French-Portuguese-Tamil-Hindi-Telugu. Library Arabic foliation1 1-12. 5-column table.

2 folios = back guard leaves. No foliation. Blank recto verso. f[2v] marbled.

binding.p: Marbled paper covers. Emblem, title and shelfmark on the spine.

origin.origDate: No internal date. Dated to circa 1850 by Vinson (1868) and to 1850 by Cabaton (1912), on unstated grounds (presumably palaeographical and material analysis arguments). Not after 1854, since part of the collection of Édouard Ariel (1818-1854), bequeathed in 1855 to the Société Asiatique, Paris (Rosny 1868).

provenance.p: Written by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequeathed by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois et malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 26, no. 138.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 38r, no. 138.

Vinson, Julien. 1868. Manuscrits tamouls. Proofreadings of the catalogue for Tamoul 1-204 (old shelfmark). Printed by the atelier oriental de l’Imprimerie nationale. BnF “4-IMPROR-77 (B)”. — The same proofreadings with black ink handwritten corrections are found in Vinson et al. (1866-, f1-f49). — See p. 38, no. 138.
Vinson, Julien. n.d. BnF Indien 1062, f54r, no. 137 138.
James, Gregory. 2000. Colporuḷ: A History of Tamil Dictionaries. 1st edition. Chennai: Cre-A. — See p. 692.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: Revised by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 1, May 2022.
